# Public Health Environmental Surveillance Evaluation Framework (PHES-EF)

*An international consensus study to develop an evaluation framework for public health environmental surveillance*
:::
\
Welcome to our eDelphi study platform, where we unite global expertise to establish a consensus-driven, open science approach for evaluating wastewater-based surveillance. Our goal is to collaboratively define the most robust practices for assessing this emerging public health surveillance tool.
